creator: Hoppsharing BV
descriptionHtml:
Hoppy is a provider of shared e-scooters and e-bikes on the Costa Blanca.

Hoppy is fast, easy, cheap and environmentally friendly.

Our mission is to make fun, affordable transportation possible for everyone!

How it works:

Download the Hoppy app
Register
Find a Hoppy near you
Scan the QR code on the Hoppy to unlock
Park your Hoppy on the sidewalk without blocking paths
Don't worry, be Hoppy :)

Please note that users must be 18 years of age or older to use our vehicles.
Hoppy is currently already present in the following cities in Spain:

-Altea
-Albir
-Torrevieja
-Orihuela
-El Campello
descriptionShort: Hoppy is a provider of shared e-scooters and e-bikes on the Costa Blanca.

title: Hoppy Spain

creator: Hoppsharing BV
descriptionHtml:
Hoppy is your quick, easy, cheap and eco-friendly transportation solution.

We're working to bring fun, affordable last-mile transportation to the world.

How it works:

Download the Hoppy app
Register
Find a Hoppy nearby
Scan the QR code on the scooter to unlock
Park your Hoppy on the sidewalk without blocking pathways
Donʼt worry, be Hoppy :)

Please note: riders must be 18 years or older to use our scooters.
descriptionShort: Getting from point A to B has never been easier!
title:
Hoppy Mobility
7.40
